text: Bush Hill Park railway station is in the London Borough of Enfield in north London. It is in Travelcard Zone 5, on the Enfield Town branch of the Lea Valley Lines. The station, and all trains serving it, is operated by London Overground. ==References== Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Enfield Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia Category:1880 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Bush Hill Park railway station
